name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior Python Engineer with 10+ years of experience specializing in **Python**, **Django**, **Flask**, and **FastAPI** for creating secure and scalable backend solutions. Proven expertise in **Microservices** architecture, leveraging **Design Patterns** and **Best Practices** to deliver maintainable systems. Proficient in implementing **Infrastructure as Code** using **Terraform**, **Ansible**, and **CloudFormation** to streamline deployment processes across cloud platforms like **AWS**, **Azure**, and **Google Cloud**.
Extensive experience with **Docker** and **Kubernetes** for containerization and orchestration, alongside continuous integration and deployment (CI/CD) practices using **Jenkins**, **GitLab CI/CD**, and **GitHub Actions**. Strong command of **Linux** and shell scripting in **Bash** for efficient system management. Adept at utilizing monitoring and logging solutions such as **Prometheus**, **Grafana**, and the **ELK Stack** to ensure system reliability and performance.
Demonstrated history of building data-driven applications with relational databases (**PostgreSQL**, **MySQL**) and NoSQL options (**MongoDB**, **Redis**). Passionate about employing innovative technology to solve complex problems and deliver impactful solutions in healthcare and finance.

experience.responsibilities:
•	Developed scalable microservices using **Python**, employing frameworks such as **FastAPI** and **Django**, ensuring adherence to best practices and design patterns for robust software development.
•	Implemented Infrastructure as Code (IaC) using **Terraform** and **CloudFormation** for seamless deployment in cloud environments like **AWS** and **Azure**, improving deployment efficiency by **30%**.
•	Designed and maintained cloud-native databases with **PostgreSQL** and **MongoDB**, optimizing performance for data ingestion and queries, handling **millions** of records efficiently.
•	Led the transition of monolithic applications to a microservices architecture using **Docker** and **Kubernetes**, enhancing system scalability and reducing downtime by **25%**.
•	Created CI/CD pipelines using **GitHub Actions** and **GitLab CI/CD**, implementing automated testing and deployment processes, reducing release cycle time by **40%**.
•	Built and integrated RESTful APIs in both **Flask** and **FastAPI** for data-driven applications in healthcare, ensuring compliance with industry-specific regulations.
•	Utilized observability tools like **Prometheus** and **Grafana** to monitor microservices performance and optimize resource utilization, resulting in improved response times by **20%**.
•	Conducted code reviews and established coding standards to advance best practices within the team, mentoring junior engineers to grow their skills in cloud technologies and Python frameworks.
•	Collaborated with cross-functional teams to align development efforts with business goals and deliver high-quality software that meets both technical and user needs.
•	Ensured the implementation of security practices across applications and infrastructure to protect sensitive data and maintain compliance with regulations, enhancing application security posture.

• Led the development of **cloud-based** financial platforms with a focus on **microservices** architecture utilizing **Python** frameworks such as **Django** and **FastAPI**, enhancing system scalability by over **30%**.
• Designed and implemented **CI/CD** pipelines using **Jenkins**, **GitLab CI/CD**, and **GitHub Actions**, resulting in a **40%** reduction in deployment time for finance applications.
• Built dynamic applications employing **React** (18), **Vue 3**, and **Next.js** with **TypeScript**, ensuring the front-end was responsive and performant, achieving user satisfaction ratings above **95%**.
• Developed analytical dashboards using **D3.js** and integrated with **Power BI Embedded**, allowing operations teams to perform real-time transaction analysis with data processing times reduced by **25%**.
• Established event-driven architectures with **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus** to improve asynchronous communications and transaction processing, achieving near real-time performance.
• Built and orchestrated ETL pipelines using **Apache Airflow**, **Azure Data Factory**, and **Python**, streamlining financial data ingestion from **5+** internal and third-party sources.
• Developed and optimized AI/ML systems for fraud detection utilizing **scikit-learn** and **XGBoost**, identifying suspicious activities with an accuracy rate exceeding **90%**.
• Created ML pipelines for credit scoring and transaction classification, utilizing **MLflow** and **Airflow** to integrate model inference seamlessly into backend services for real-time decision-making.

Utilized **Python** (including **Django**, **Flask**, and **FastAPI**) to design and optimize microservices for a global e-commerce platform, achieving **99.9%** uptime and reducing latency to under **200ms** for checkout and order fulfillment modules.
Employed **Infrastructure as Code** principles using **Terraform** and **Ansible** to manage cloud resources efficiently across **AWS**, enhancing deployment consistency and scalability.
Implemented **CI/CD** pipelines with **Jenkins**, **GitLab CI/CD**, and **GitHub Actions**, automating deployment processes to reduce deployment time by **30%**.
Developed secure and resilient backend architectures following design patterns and best practices, implementing **Docker** containers and orchestrating with **Kubernetes** to ensure high availability.
Applied advanced data storage solutions using **PostgreSQL**, **MongoDB**, and **Redis**, and improved data retrieval speeds by **50%** for high-traffic e-commerce workflows.
Monitored application performance and reliability through **Prometheus** and **Grafana**, achieving actionable insights that led to a **25%** reduction in downtime.
Optimized backend processing flows using secure coding practices, ensuring compliance with GDPR and securing user data through **role-based access control (RBAC)** and **OAuth 2.0**.
Collaborated with frontend teams to integrate seamless user experiences across web applications built with **React** and **Vue 3**, ensuring fast load times and optimized for mobile engagement.
Implemented automated testing frameworks and performance monitoring, achieving a **95%** test coverage on critical components to ensure high code quality and reliability.
